author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Google's take on XR hardware is beginning to reveal itself as it plans to launch multiple Android XR products in the coming years. We visit their Android XR lab to go hands-on with several prototypes, including XREAL's Project Aura, the latests Galaxy XR update, and two pairs of display smart glasses for everyday wear. Joining us for these impressions is CNET's Scott Stein, a veteren AR/VR reporter who also demoed these devices. 

Today's Android XR announcements: https://www.android.com/xr/show/
Thanks to Scott Stein for guesting in this video! Find more of Scott's work at: https://www.cnet.com/profiles/scottstein8/
https://bsky.app/profile/scottstein.bsky.social 
https://intertwixt.beehiiv.com/ 

Shot and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B
title: Tested: Google's Android XR Smart Glasses Prototype Impressions!

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
From portable paint stations to repurposed hospital equipment, Sean shares some of his favorite discoveries, tools, and projects from this past year!

Audioengine B1 Bluetooth Streamer: https://amzn.to/49Z5OEJ
NECA Dante's Inferno Room: https://store.necaonline.com/products/beetlejuice-1988-ultimate-trench-coat-with-spikes-beetlejuice-action-figure-dantes-inferno-room-deluxe-set
Bauhaus Undead book: https://cleorecs.com/products/bauhaus-undead-expanded-edition-book
Pixel Buds Pro 2: https://amzn.to/3YdWENn
Ergotron StyleView SV42 Medical Cart: Check salvage warehouses and FB marketplace
LED Mini Spotlights - Color Set: https://amzn.to/3XCydZT
USB Single Dimmable mini spotlight: https://amzn.to/4pSLoBI
Airbrush Paint Booth: https://amzn.to/48FnJOu

Find more of Sean's work in our Tested Team channel: https://www.youtube.com/@TestedTeam/
an
title: Tested in 2025: Sean's Favorite Things!
